Node.js is our runtime <!-- ✅ -->
We support React.js for UI <!-- ✅ -->
Please run tests in CI/CD <!-- ✅ -->
Use abbreviations like e.g. and i.e. <!-- ✅ -->
Our code uses import/export syntax <!-- ✅ -->
See https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html for details <!-- ✅ -->
